content.rendered:
Home

SECURE YOUR COIN AND
BANK NOTES IN Manhattan

At Integrated Vaults Vault, we understand your coin’s and bank notes’ significance. That’s why we offer secure deposit safety box solutions designed to provide you with the best security that you can trust.
Book a Tour

Coin and Bank Note Storage You Can Trust

Our deposit safety boxes go beyond basic security, offering unmatched protection with features you won’t find elsewhere. This ensures your precious coins and banknotes remain safeguarded, giving you the peace of mind your collection deserves.
SECURE A SAFETY DEPOSIT BOX

PROTECTING YOUR COINS AND BANKNOTES

Our state-of-the-art safety deposit boxes protect your valuables. Here’s what sets Fortis Vault apart:

  • Advanced Security Measures: Our facility features a multi-layered security system, including 24/7 surveillance, intrusion detection, and armed response protocols. You can rest assured your valuables are protected by the latest security technology.
  • Convenient Access: Fortis Vault provides convenient access to your safety deposit box. You can visit our facility during designated hours to access your valuables at your discretion.
  • Variety of Box Sizes: We offer four safety deposit box sizes to accommodate your needs. Whether you have a small collection of commemorative coins or a large portfolio of high-value banknotes, we have the perfect size to keep your valuables organised and secure.

SECURITY At Integrated Vaults

Whether it’s a rare coin collection meticulously built over the years, a cherished banknote from your travels, or a portfolio of valuable investment coins, we recognise these items’ immense value for collectors and investors. That’s why security is not just a value we hold – it’s the cornerstone of everything we do. We are committed to providing a haven where you can store your coin and banknote collection with complete confidence, knowing they are protected by the most advanced security systems and protocols.  

SECURE A SAFETY DEPOSIT BOX

WHY CHOOSE At Integrated Vaults?

SUPERIOR CUSTOMER SERVICE

 

Our professional staff is dedicated to providing you with exceptional service and support.

NO ACCESS FEES

Pay only for your safety deposit box size.

NO HIDDEN FEES

We offer complete transparency in our pricing.

STATE-OF-THE-ART SECURITY TECHNOLOGY

 

We utilise the latest security advancements to protect your valuables.

FLEXIBLE ACCESS OPTIONS

 

Choose the access plan that best suits your needs through convenient scheduling.

PRIVATE VIEWING ROOMS

 

Discreetly review your belongings in a dedicated, secure space.

SAFETY DEPOSIT BOX MADE EASY

Booking an appointment to access your safety deposit box At Integrated Vaults is a simple process:

  1. Find At Integrated Vaults: Our location is deliberately chosen to be easily accessible.
  2. Select a storage size: We have four box sizes available, so you can choose the one that suits your needs. Browse our selection of safety deposit box sizes online or visit us in person to discuss the requirements with a member of our friendly team.
  3. Automate your payments: We offer a convenient auto-pay system to avoid late fees and ensure uninterrupted access to your valuables.

OTHER SOLUTIONS OFFERED

At Integrated Vaults cater to a wide range of valuables

Jewellery

 

Keeping your precious jewellery safe in United States is a constant concern. Imagine the peace of mind of knowing your cherished heirlooms and sparkling gems are protected from burglary, fire, and unforeseen events.

Gold Bullion

 

Your valuables deserve the utmost security. At Integrated Vaults, we understand the importance of protecting your precious metals and other assets. That’s why we offer a range of secure deposit box solutions to provide unparalleled peace of mind.

Important Documents

 

Irreplaceable documents like wills, passports, birth certificates, and property deeds hold immense importance. At Integrated Vaults provides a safe and reliable solution for storing these critical documents.

SMSF Storage

 

We understand the importance of trusting your SMSF gold storage. That’s why we offer state-of-the-art safe deposit boxes designed to provide unparalleled peace of mind.

FREQUENTLY ASKED QUESTIONS

What security features exist for coin and banknote storage At Integrated Vaults?
At Integrated Vaults secures your coin and banknote collections with advanced security features, including high-definition CCTV monitoring, and 24/7 guarded facilities. via dual-control security protocols, ensuring your valuables are protected against theft and unauthorised access.
Can I access my coin and banknote collection at any time?
Access to coin and banknote collections stored At Integrated Vaults is available during our standard business hours. Private viewing rooms are available by appointment so you can securely access and examine your collection.
What are the insurance options for stored coin and banknote collections?
At Integrated Vaults offers a third party comprehensive insurance coverage for all stored coin and banknote collections. Clients can choose from several insurance levels based on the assessed value of their collection, ensuring that they have appropriate coverage that meets their specific needs.
How do I start using the coin and banknote storage service At Integrated Vaults?
Contact At Integrated Vaults directly via phone, email, or our website to begin using our coin and banknote storage service. We will schedule a consultation to discuss your storage needs and provide a personalised storage solution. Once the service agreement is signed, you can securely schedule a time to transfer your collection to our facility.
Are there any restrictions on the types of coins and banknotes that can be stored?
At Integrated Vaults accepts coins and banknotes, including rare, antique, and collectible items. However, we do not store items that are illegal, counterfeit, or derived from illicit activities. We recommend consulting with our experts if you have specific questions regarding the eligibility of your collection for storage.

SAFETY DEPOSIT BOX MADE EASY

Booking an appointment to access your safety deposit box At Integrated Vaults is a simple process:

01. Find At Integrated Vaults

 

Our location is deliberately chosen to be easily accessible

Find now

02. Select a storage size

 

We have four box sizes available so you can choose the one that suits your needs. Browse our selection of safety deposit box sizes online or visit us in person to discuss the requirements with a member of our friendly team.

View Storage Sizes

03. Automate your payments

 

We offer a convenient auto-pay system to avoid late fees and ensure uninterrupted access to your valuables.

Start Now

CONTACT US TODAY!

Ready to secure your peace of mind? Contact At Integrated Vaults today to learn more about our secure valuables or gold bullion storage solutions or to schedule a visit to our facility.

Phone:

(646) 338 4170
(9am – 5pm AEST)

 

Fax:

(03) 9654 8167

 

Mailing Address:

800 Third Avenue
Midtown Manhattan, New York 10022

 

Email Us:

info@integratedvaults.com

 

OUR VAULT LOCATION

Level 10, 227 Collins Street (Wales Corner Building)
Manhattan, Victoria
United States
